title: "Missed Call" banner notification on lock screen of Google Pixel 4
content:
Switched from an iPhone 6 to a Pixel 4 so I admit there is an "unlearning" curve :D

Is there a way to have a banner display on the lock screen to show missed calls?  All I seem to have is the blue dot on the phone icon circle which only shows if I unlock my phone.  Frankly that is not nearly enough for me to notice.  Even on the lock screen there are five tiny icons, one of them being a phone with an arrow bouncing off of it.  Is there a way to have banners similar to iPhone "Missed Call (x)" ?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
